Text:

Hello starca, your thanks are appreciated!

I got 71% of file and nothings happends for 8 hours
but I still waithing...

01 Oct 2007 - no peers, no seeds, trackers offline :(
I have PeaTea's season 4 01-11 and it's a good rip (really enjoyed i); I was looking forward to getting the 2nd half of the season but can't seem to d/l it.  Any chance of a seeder coming online...I'm willing to continue seeding for a week or so afterwards?

Hi starca and 265feral,
I have been seeding continously. (except for an hour).
I just checked and I see that 76.5% have been transfered, 20 people have 76.5%, 1 has 76.8%, 3 have 76.7%. Just remember, I am the only one seeding, since I have all the complete files on my PC.
My upload rate is slow, but I will seed, till I see at least 10 people who have 100%.
Just be patient, you'll get it all!
greetz from PeaTea

Thank you for notice us.
Whats hepend with servers upgrade on Pirate Bay???

Hi starca and 265 Feral,
I just noticed that Piratebay ist making an upgrade and that the tracker will be unstable for a while!
Maybe that's the explanation for the very slow upload!?
greetz from PeaTea

Could someone please seed some eps from Season 3? 

Ep 5, 6, and 8 a bunch of people have at ~98% and I'd love 11, 14, 15 and 16. 

Cheers!

Hi pauli150---
I've reseeded for you: NYPD Season 3, Episodes 5, 6, 8, 11, 14, 15, and 16
greetz PeaTea
could someone please seed the last part (from episode 10) of season 3 again? Many of the episodes are ~90% complete (some much less though)

this is by far the most awesome tv show to ever be watched.THANK YOU! for the time you put into ripping and uploading.the quality of this is perfect to me with intros intact and everything is there.THANK YOU THANK YOU! you have made my year and my next year as well^_^ i will seed til forever.and im not lying.this is an excellent show!thanks again my friend^_^

Thanks "vampfyr" for your comment!
By the way, Season 5, 6, and 7 can be found on min???va! All are rips off VHS-Video Tapes, they are still fairly good quality and are very watchable, all in english!

Unless I got confused by something, #20 is really the season ending (#22), so watch #20 last. 

Other than that, it's all good.

Be careful that the one labeled as episode 18, Emission Impossible, is actually the season finale. If watched out of sequence, you'll have a major storyline fuddled. 

Thanks to ripper and uploader. Just thought I'd clarify.
Oh guy previous was right. Yeah, ep 20 is actually ep 22. Watch: 19, 21, 22, 20
